Getting started with idf-plotter¶

The idf-plotter project creates an overview of an EnergyPlus IDF file. If you have EnergyPlus installed on your system, you will have a bunch of these files kicking around. Check the ExampleFiles folder of your EnergyPlus installation.

Prerequisites¶

You will need to install ply:

$ pip install ply

You will also nead to have GraphViz installed and accessible from your %PATH%.

Running idf-plotter the easy way¶

The easiest way to use the idf-plotter is with the findreferences.bat file.

Example:

C:\idf-plotter\findreferences.bat C:\EnergyPlusV8-4-0\ExampleFiles\gasAbsorptionChillerHeater.idf

This will create a files called output.dot.pdf in the current directory.
